titleInfo.title: USA v. Richardson
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER - The magistrate judges findings and recommendation (filing 38) are adopted; the defendants statement of objections (filing 41) is denied; and the defendants motion to suppress (filing 32) is denied in all respects as to Abraham Richardson (1). Ordered by Senior Judge Richard G. Kopf. (MKR)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER - The magistrate judges findings and recommendation (filing 38) are adopted; the defendants statement of objections (filing 41) is denied; and the defendants motion to suppress (filing 32) is denied in all respects as to Abraham Richardson (1). titleInfo.title: USA v. Richardson
titleInfo.subTitle: PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITURE as to Abraham Richardson (1) - The United States' Motion for Issuance of Preliminary Order of Forfeiture is hereby sustained. Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture pursuant to 18 U.S.C. 2253, in which all interests will be addressed. Ordered by Senior Judge Richard G. Kopf. (TEL)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITURE as to Abraham Richardson (1) - The United States' Motion for Issuance of Preliminary Order of Forfeiture is hereby sustained. Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture pursuant to 18 U.S.C. 2253, in which all interests will be addressed. Ordered by Senior Judge Richard G. Kopf. (TEL)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Richardson
titleInfo.subTitle: TENTATIVE FINDINGS OF FACT regarding Revised Presentence Investigation Report and Addendum as to defendant Abraham Richardson. It is ordered that:... (2)The defendant's objections set forth in addendum will be resolved at sentencing, as will the issue of restitution.(3)Except to the extent (if at all) that I have sustained an objection or granted a motion or reserved an issue for later resolution in the preceding paragraph, the parties are herewith notified that my tentative findings are that the presentence report is correct in all respects. ETC. Ordered by Senior Judge Richard G. Kopf. (KLL, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Richardson
titleInfo.subTitle: FINAL ORDER OF FORFEITURE- The Plaintiff's Motion for Final Order of Forfeiture 76 is hereby sustained. All right, title and interest in and to the following properties, held by any person or entity, are hereby forever barred and foreclosed: 1. One eMachines desktop computer, model #T5086, serial #XCY7120004365, containing one Western Digital Hard Drive, serial #WD-WCANKA860918; 2. One 256MB Toshiba SD Card, serial #0436SF5228H; 3. One LG Chocolate Touch Phone, Model #VX8575, serial #003KPUU1101822, containing a 2GB SanDisk Micro SD card, serial #0908203553C3HE. The properties described above, be, and the same hereby are, forfeited to the United States of America. The United States is directed to dispose of said properties in accordance with law as to Abraham Richardson (1). Ordered by Senior Judge Richard G. Kopf. (1 Certified copy to USM)( MKR)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: FINAL ORDER OF FORFEITURE- The Plaintiff's Motion for Final Order of Forfeiture 76 is hereby sustained. All right, title and interest in and to the following properties, held by any person or entity, are hereby forever barred and foreclosed: 1. One eMachines desktop computer, model #T5086, serial #XCY7120004365, containing one Western Digital Hard Drive, serial #WD-WCANKA860918; 2. One 256MB Toshiba SD Card, serial #0436SF5228H; 3. One LG Chocolate Touch Phone, Model #VX8575, serial #003KPUU1101822, containing a 2GB SanDisk Micro SD card, serial #0908203553C3HE. The properties described above, be, and the same hereby are, forfeited to the United States of America. The United States is directed to dispose of said properties in accordance with law as to Abraham Richardson (1). Ordered by Senior Judge Richard G. Kopf. (1 Certified copy to USM)( MKR)
